pages.text: With enough bees producing combs, especially at an industrial scale, you'll want to start making your machines better. Ever-useful propolis and some other materials will make special modules that you can use to upgrade your machines!$(br2)All machine upgrades stack multiplicatively, just like frames.

pages.title: Basic Upgrade
pages.text: This upgrade is the foundation of all other upgrades; on its own it provides a small boost to both efficiency and speed.

pages.title: Royal Upgrade
pages.text: This upgrade is the basis of some very powerful higher-tier upgrades; on its own, it provides a moderate boost to efficiency and speed.
